translations: n.山楂，山楂果；吆喝牲畜左转；瞬膜

phrs.translation: 支支吾吾；哼哼哈哈；犹豫

sentences.sentence: Pinocchio screamed with pain and as he screamed he brayed: Haw!
sentences.translation: 皮诺乔疼得叫了起来，他一边叫，一边呻吟：“嚯嚯！”

sentences.sentence: Instead of moans and cries, they burst forth into loud donkey brays, which sounded very much like, Haw!
sentences.translation: 他们不再呻吟和哭泣，而是发出响亮的驴叫声，听起来很像是嚯嚯的声音！

sentences.sentence: I made this haw jelly cake myself.
sentences.translation: 这是我自己制作的山楂糕。
